programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Coast of the Whalesharks
programme.desc: On the remote coastline of Australia’s northwest, there are great natural wonders to be found. Above the sea on this sunbaked coast, there is very little; only a sparse landscape shaped by the arid conditions. But here, the miracle reveals itself…

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Venezuela: The Treasure of El Dorado
programme.desc: Venezuela is famous for its lost worlds, its forbidding mountains, huge swamps, and impenetrable jungles, all seemingly cut off in space and time. Yet each is linked, by the mighty river: the Orinoco, the rumoured route to El Dorado, city of gold.

programme.title: Wildest India: Ganges: River of Life
programme.desc: Then watch, the longest river in India, The Ganges. It's a lifeline to wild animals, from rhinoceros and river dolphins to otters and gharials.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Namibia: Sands of Time
programme.desc: Namibia is an arid, rough land. However, it has been inhabited for thousands of years, by people as well as animals, and shows no sign of losing popularity with either.

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: The Tundra: Desert of Ice
programme.desc: Covering a fifth of the earth's surface, the Arctic tundra is one of the coldest places on the planet. The piercing temperatures and powerful winds challenge even the hardiest of creatures.

programme.title: Labyrinth

programme.title: Sensing Murder

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No More Grannies / The Granny Killer

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Blood Sport: The Bondi Gay Murders

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Death in a Heartbeat / The Body in the Bag
programme.desc: CI examines the Dr. Victor Chang extortion murder as well as the horrific Jane Doe Case where a girl is found lying on the side of the road of an inner Sydney suburb wrapped in two plastic garbage bags.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Ben and Marcus work together to save an abused dog. Tayler is determined her pregnant dog will win the regional yard dog trials. Meanwhile, Jaz goes to extreme lengths to take care of the goat herd and prove herself to Grace and Stevie.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Jaz's ex-boyfriend arrives from Italy with a plan to save her Olympic career and win her back. Meanwhile, Moira's world is turned upside down when she discovers some shocking news.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Jaz is shattered when her Prince Charming betrays her. Meanwhile, Patrick is jealous of Tayler's friendship with her "study buddy" and Grace has a glamour makeover for a charity ball, and finds herself kissing someone inappropriate.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Stevie gets sweet revenge on a farmer spreading cruel rumours about her relationship with Marcus. Meanwhile, Moira and Phil start to make plans for parenthood, until tragedy strikes.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Jaz attempts to retrain her show jumping horse to work on the property. Meanwhile, Grace unwittingly befriends a visiting Detective, unaware he is Ingrid's dangerous ex-husband.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: I Am Not Guilty

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Civil War Spirits

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: You Snooze, You Lose
programme.desc: Beth designs a luxurious new office for the team and shows it off to Dog, but the bounty hunter is more interested in starting his hunt for Federico, who's been revoked for missing court dates and generally running amuck.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Dog goes on his a case, which involves Bobby, who's been on parole for three months pending sentencing on an assault charge. Bobby's girlfriend wants him back in jail, and Dog agrees that the Bobby needs to be behind bars.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Moms & Dads
programme.desc: Dog pursues two people whose lives have been ruined by drugs. First, he tracks Mae, who traded a good home and loving family for an ice pipe. The next case involves Jude. His addiction has caused his pregnant wife to fear for her safety.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Do Unto Others
programme.desc: Dog is a rough, tough bounty hunter, but he's a softie at heart, as the two cases in this episode show.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Helping Hand
programme.desc: Dog answers two very different calls for help from women. In the first case, he helps Leland protect Maria, who's being threatened by her violent husband. Then Dog visit a young woman who's dying and has asked to see Dog as one of her final wishes.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Take Your Daughter to Work Day
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa, who's just turned 18 and is studying to become a bondsman, gets to do some on-the-job training when she helps Dog hunt for Wayne, who's run out on a bond for second-degree assault.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: In Sickness and In Health
programme.desc: Dog is sick as a dog, but he still must lead the hunt for a fugitive named James. James' girlfriend tries to cover for him, but Dog surprises James in his bedroom and leads him away in cuffs.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If the Shirt Fits...
programme.desc: Beth buys Dog a shirt with an embroidered chicken, but Dog explains he only wears shirts with pictures of either Jesus or a Harley-Davidson. When it's time to go to work, the team goes after Necia, a fugitive with felony charges pending.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Thief Who Stole Christmas
programme.desc: It's Christmas day, and Dog sets out to nab Raymond, who robs to support his ice habit, and give him a little Christmas gift - shiny new handcuffs.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rock-a-Bye Bounty
programme.desc: Dog and Beth must go after their former housekeeper, Lisa, who's jumped bond. They know this case will be tricky because Lisa knows everyone in the family. Luckily, Beth's nephew, Jason, is visiting and is quickly put to work as the bait.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Father-Hood
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Burger Commander
programme.desc: After visiting a popular burger restaurant, Willie and Jase get into a debate over which of them cooks the best burger, prompting them to challenge one another to a cooking contest.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: G.I. Si
programme.desc: When Willie and Jase argue over an old G.I. Joe toy, it leads them into a debate over who would make a better soldier. To settle the score, Willie and Jase head out to the woods with their friends and children for a paintball match.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jase and the Argonauts
programme.desc: When Willie gets a soft serve machine for himself, he tells the guys they can't use it until they're done working. But when Jase thinks this is unfair, he takes matters into his own hands and finds a better object to use as motivation.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Playhouse
programme.desc: When Jase finds out Jep is planning to buy his kids a fancy playhouse from a catalogue, he and the guys decide to build one for Jep themselves. But the playhouse ends up looking more like a military-style duck blind.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Big LeCOWski
programme.desc: When Sadie spends the day at Duck Commander for a school project, the guys try to show her the ins-and-outs of how a successful company works. But when Willie questions Jase's ingenuity in creating new products they get into a debate.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family pulls together a family reunion to give Mia a big send-off before her surgery.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Governor's Travels
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack and Gown
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation. Willie and Si join in, and Jase tries to keep them from imparting their "college advice" on Reed.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hands on a Woodchipper
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize: a woodchipper.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Race Against Time
programme.desc: Wade’s team haul a 70-tonne, 100ft home through crowded suburban streets - but not before they attempt to cut the home down to size. This could be an engineering nightmare!

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Mountain Hell
programme.desc: Wade fears he’s met his match with this next transport – moving a tricky cabin the most treacherous of conditions.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Hell On The Highway
programme.desc: First time buyer Doug is taking the plunge and putting his trust in Wade’s to protect his investment – a 50 tonne newly built house with all mod cons. As Doug and Wade’s crew will find out though, battling tight bridges, power lines and mechanical fa …

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Killer Storm
programme.desc: Wade, Kelly and the crew, battle forces of nature to get a bulky home to its new owners. With torrential weather threatening to derail the move, Wade and team struggle to get through the storm.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Danger In The Dark
programme.desc: Jaylene has successfully found Matt and Melanie the perfect two storey, 3600 feet, 50 tonne “second hand home” but it’s is one of the tallest houses Wade’s has ever moved and with only a tight five hour window to make it out of the city, Wade may hav …

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Dream Living, Drive From Hell
programme.desc: A routine two-hour move becomes a massive headache as Wade’s team struggles to move a sprawling 7 acre, careful crafted property.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: House Of Horrors
programme.desc: An overnight haul it through the city proves difficult as extreme forces of nature wreak havoc on the mission.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Mega Convoy
programme.desc: A mammoth four home unit measuring 134 feet long and 40 feet wide offers Wade’s team the challenge of a lifetime!

programme.title: Drug Wars: The Run Around
programme.desc: The USCG Boutwell receives intel about a possible smuggler heading out to sea with a load of drugs, but as they approach to investigate, the suspects hit full throttle

programme.title: Drug Wars: Smugglers Pit Stop
programme.desc: Panamanian Police finally locate a major drug stash hidden away and buried in a deep cave system. It will take two days for authorities to dig out all the drugs and supplies.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Caught Up
programme.desc: Syncere says Mark has lied and disrespected her on several occasions and she’s not going to stand for it anymore. Mark says he cheats on Syncere because she has a bad attitude and she gets on his nerves.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Woman
programme.desc: Rechene Hall and Itarous Parker have been together for over 4 years and are engaged, but Rechene doesn’t trust Itarous because of his lying. Itarous claims Rechene is too immature for a relationship. Is this couple headed down the break-up aisle?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Computer Love
programme.desc: As soon as this couple got engaged their romance hit the rocks. Brandi says that Brittanie can’t tell the truth if her life depended on it. Brittanie says Brandi’s insecurities and lack of trust has had a severe effect on their relationship.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Girl Summer
programme.desc: Shortly after tying the knot Diana gave Robert an ultimatum: they'd either have an open relationship or she was gone. He wants to save the marriage, but she isn't ready to compromise. Can Diana finally settle with one man, or is this really the end?

programme.title: Divorce Court: I Scream U Scream
programme.desc: Sharee moved in with Brandon shortly after they met, had a child and still no marriage. Brandon wants her to get a full-time job and not work part-time in their business before they get married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Player of the Year
programme.desc: Jordan says that Taurean is the biggest player with the ladies and still decides to lie about it even after she gave him a chance to have an open relationship. He says he talks to other women because Jordan is unaffectionate and verbally abusive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Poker Face
programme.desc: Tamika and Joseph have been together 7 years before marrying, but now his gambling addiction plus their new baby has worn the two out. Joseph’s excessive gambling habits are draining their life’s savings and he refuses to get the help he needs.

programme.title: Divorce Court: In and Out
programme.desc: Willard says he’s getting tired of this roller coaster ride of a relationship with Cynthia and he’s had just about as much as he can take with her lies and deception.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Sick and Tired
programme.desc: Timothy is tired of being kicked out the house every time Erin catches an attitude. If she kicks him out once more, he's gone for good. Erin says she dropped out of college and left behind a full tennis scholarship because of him.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Old Town Road
programme.desc: Jennifer says Josh's lies have left her and their family homeless. He has made many hurtful decisions like selling her car and dumping her dog while she was giving birth to their son. Can he pave the way for a future?

programme.title: Divorce Court: To the Left
programme.desc: This relationship between high school sweethearts has turned sour. Tonesha, though she converted to Islam for Theotis, says he still has a lot of growing up to do before they get married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Grumpy Old Man
programme.desc: Michaela and Richard’s 30-year age difference has finally taken a toll on their relationship. Richard says he just wants to settle down and enjoy the rest of his life and says that Michaela’s constant nagging is making him rethink marrying her.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Kid Stuff
programme.desc: A fugitive from justice is on the lam and it's Dog's job to find him. When they hit the last known address they discover he already has pulled up stakes and left no forwarding address. The posse's one hope is to locate his girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Easy Does It
programme.desc: There is a running joke in the posse that every time Bobby Brown asks them for help with a fugitive, he always promises them it's "an easy one," but the hunts end up being epic searches.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Dog believes in safety first, and today's hunt puts this philosophy to the test. The fugitive's problem with anger management increases the dangers of their already risky line of work. Dog warns the crew to be ready for anything as they head out.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Back in the Hood
programme.desc: Today, Dog's bounty is about to take him on a trip down memory lane and test his investigative chops. With each lead propelling him closer and closer to his childhood haunts, Dog uses old-fashioned detective skills to track his prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Road
programme.desc: Dog is a big-hearted guy. He's helping Mary Ellen, his friend and fellow bondsman, on a dangerous night hunt for a fugitive she is now regretting bailing out. He's also giving his nephew Justin a second chance to rejoin the team.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait and Switch
programme.desc: Things are seldom what they seem in the world of bounty hunting. When the fugitive's girlfriend offers to help Dog trap this dangerous felon, Dog knows that someone is being deceived. The only question is, whom?

programme.title: Operation Repo: We Weren't Informed
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy end up on one of the weirdest repos they've ever encountered when a white cargo van unleashes a wave of workers. Then, Lou, Sonia, and Rob go green when they find they learn the Mercedes Benz they are after has been converted.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Tijuana Surprise
programme.desc: Matt and Froy's business hits another snag when a gang of bat-wielding partiers keeps them away from a car and a paycheck. Then, Lou and Sonia wind up in the crosshairs when they attempt to repo a car from a man who appears to be a federal agent.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Lyndah's Revenge
programme.desc: Matt and Froy continue their risky run in Tijuana, confronting a strip club owner who keeps a tight grip on his vehicle and his employees. Then, Lou and Cousin Rob are in a case of he said- she said when a seductive young debtor calls in the police.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Willie or Won’t He
programme.desc: Yvonne is concerned that William is never going to marry her because they have not set a date for the wedding. When Yvonne asks Joan for advice, Joan tries her best to stay out of it but ends up telling Yvonne to move in with William first to try it out.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Joan’s Birthday Suit
programme.desc: For her thirtieth birthday, Joan finds that she is happy with who she is, yet finds that she’s not so happy that her father is a nudist.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Trick or Truth?
programme.desc: When Toni loses her friend Joan, her man, and her gold card, it’s up to Maya and Lynn to help her get her life back together.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Maya Takes a Stan
programme.desc: Due to marital tensions at home, an emotionally fragile Maya finds herself falling into a fantasy affair with a handsome and empathetic new friend, Stan.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Mom’s the Word
programme.desc: Toni meets a great man but is dumped after she’s a bad influence on his eight-year-old daughter. Joan dates a movie star but is dumped when he begins to think she’s stalking him.

programme.title: Girlfriends: You Better Watch Out
programme.desc: Maya refuses to end her relationship with Stan, despite her girlfriends' repeated warnings to do so.

programme.title: Girlfriends: I Have a Dream House
programme.desc: As a gesture of his love, William buys a beautiful house for his fiance, Yvonne.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Sister, Sistah
programme.desc: Lynn's Caucasian sister, Tanya, travels to LA to help Lynn celebrate her Gotcha Day: the day when Lynn's childhood adoption to her Caucasian family became legal.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Make Him Great
programme.desc: Danni attempts to get answers from Logan regarding his suspicious behaviour. (S4, ep22)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Pilot
programme.desc: Four single friends who have been each other's backbone for over a decade experience a roller coaster ride of emotions on their journey to find "Mr. Right". (S1, ep1)

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Sickness
programme.desc: Something is making Lisa and her family sick. Is it natural or paranormal? Ryan and the team uncover the tragic history surrounding Lisa's home--with shocking connections to respiratory illness.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room & Board
programme.desc: The owners of a vacation lodge in the remote town of North Hudson, NY, feel their woodsy getaway is plagued by negative spirits.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Smoke and Shadows
programme.desc: Sarah believes her Parkville, MD home has been invaded by a powerful force ever since her roommate Dennis moved in. PRS investigates claims that Dennis has been attacked by the entity, a possible poltergeist.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Night Terrors
programme.desc: Ryan leads his team to one of the most haunted places in the US to confront their fears and solve a paranormal mystery. Aside from the alleged spirits of dead prisoners, something even darker may be lurking inside West Virginia State Penitentiary.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Lost Souls
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/medium Michelle Belanger investigate a Pennsylvania home; where a mother named Kathy and her son Michael have both felt the presence of a young boy and hear voices calling, "Mom?" but no one is there.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Paranormal Detour
programme.desc: With time off between cases, Ryan suggests to the PRS team they choose a random town to investigate. They roll into St. Helens, Oregon, home of Twilight, where they learn about the long history of the paranormal in the area.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Homecoming
programme.desc: Ryan brings PRS to his hometown of Sumter, SC to investigate a chilling case where a young boy was tragically shot and killed on a front doorstep while trick-or-treating on Halloween.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Basement
programme.desc: A history of violence may connect the spiritual activity in Heidi's Ohio home to a long run of misery and cruelty.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Fire
programme.desc: Christina has been experiencing paranormal activity ever since her father and step-mother were murdered near Columbus, OH last year. PRS and psychic/medium?Chip Coffey delve into a open murder case and wind up exposing a family divide.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Invitation to Evil
programme.desc: Paula and her husband Mike are under siege by a purported shadow demon in their North Carolina home. Paula has witnessed a toddler bed levitating and heard deep growls. Michelle, Ryan and the team uncover the shocking truth behind the haunting.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Oakwell House
programme.desc: The team investigate Oakwell House near Leeds, which was built by ancestors of Fred Batt. In 1684, William Batt returned unexpectedly from a trip to London but vanished leaving a bloody footprint. A demon dog has been seen in the grounds.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Knottingley Town Hall
programme.desc: This location is said to be overflowing with paranormal activity, which doesn’t disappoint.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Capesthorne Hall
programme.desc: The beauty of this magnificent Cheshire country house hides the horror that lies in its corridors. As well a poltergeist activity the team manage to catch some of their best evidence to date and even our sceptic hears noises.

programme.title: Most Haunted: 30 East Drive_PT1
programme.desc: 30 East Drive is said to house the most violent poltergeist in the world. The team go head first into what becomes their toughest challenge yet. As soon as they enter the property something is waiting and wants to be known.

programme.title: Most Haunted: 30 East Drive_PT2
programme.desc: The team continue their most threatening investigation yet and for some they will be scared for life mentally and physically. The most violent poltergeist in the world is ready for a fight...but who wins?

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: One Fresh Batch of Lemonade - Part 2
programme.desc: Jonathan enlists the aid of a gymnast to rehabilitate Deke. Meanwhile, Deke's parents have been deeply affected by the accident.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Divine Madness
programme.desc: A construction company tycoon now believes he's King Arthur, and his estranged son determines to have him declared incompetent. Can Jonathan work a reconciliation?

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Catch A Falling Star
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark have been hired to look after the kids of a movie star who never has time to spend with his family.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Help Wanted: Angel
programme.desc: An elderly scriptwriter needs someone to bankroll his movie. Meanwhile, Mark has fallen in love with an attractive woman, but Jonathan receives news about her from higher up.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Dust Child
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark must help an Amerasian girl facing racial prejudice when she goes to live with her father's family in the United States.

programme.title: Sliders

programme.title: Sliders

programme.title: Arthur: Around the World in 11 Minutes/Muffy and the Big Bad Blog
programme.desc: Pal, Baby Kate, Amigo, and Mei Lin enthusiastically accept Nemo's dare to travel around the world and make it back in 11 minutes. Then, Muffy discovers that web blogging is a great way to keep her readers up to date with her every move.

programme.title: Arthur: Molina's Mulligan/Buster Bombs
programme.desc: Alberto discovers he has a natural talent for golf and begins to compete, but will his dad's embarrassing cheers make him give it up? Buster has lost his flair for funny, and the harder he tries to make people laugh, the worse it gets.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's First Sleepover/Arthur's New Year's Eve
programme.desc: Have you ever been afraid of the dark? Despite D.W.'s threat of aliens, Arthur sets his tent for his first sleepover. Then, what exactly happens at midnight, December 31st? There are plenty of rumors, but no one seems to know for sure.

programme.title: Arthur: Dear Adil/Bitzi's Break-Up
programme.desc: Arthur is worried that his letters to his new Turkish pen pal, Adil, will be boring. After all, how can Elwood City compare to Arthur's fantastical ideas about Turkey? Bitzi is breaking up with her boyfriend, and Buster is really sad.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. Thinks Big/Arthur Cleans Up
programme.desc: Once again, Arthur gets to do everything. Mostly he gets to carry the ring in Aunt Lucy's wedding. Elwood City's park is in sad shape, and after grumbling about it, the kids find themselves volunteered to clean it up.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W., Queen of the Comeback/In My Africa
programme.desc: The Tibbles tease, D.W. fires back, the Tibbles taunt, D.W. has a snappy comeback, and round and round they go! Will it ever end? Then, D.W.'s new classmate, Cheikh, is Brain's young cousin…and is also from Senegal, Africa!

programme.title: Arthur: For the Birds/Ungifted
programme.desc: Brain dreams of being the first to spot a rare bird species called the green-tailed grebe, making him famous. Arthur and Buster's friendship is put to the test when Arthur gives away a present that Buster had given him for his birthday.

programme.title: Arthur's First Day
programme.desc: It's finally the first day of fourth grade and Arthur couldn't be more excited - until he learns Buster is in another class! Meanwhile, D.W. is nervous for her first day of kindergarten. Will Arthur and D.W. be able to make new friends?

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of the Bulge (December 1944)
programme.desc: The December 1944 battle pitting American forces against German Panzer divisions in the Ardennes Forest.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Mount Hot Rocks (February 19, 1945)
programme.desc: American forces landing on the shores of Iwo Jima encounter Japanese combatants willing to fight to the death.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of Remagen
programme.desc: German forces retreat across the Rhine on the Remagen bridge near the close of the war.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of Okinawa
programme.desc: Kamikaze pilots guard the island of Okinawa from American forces.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Fall of Berlin
programme.desc: In 1945, Soviet and American troops press Hitler's armies from the west and the east, culminating in the fall of Berlin.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Commerce Raiders
programme.desc: Heavily armed vessels disguised as ordinary cargo ships patrolled allied waters, sinking supply boats and stealing their content.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Bombing of Germany
programme.desc: The development of the B-17 bomber, which allowed American planes to reach inside Germany and bomb its cities.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: U-Boat War
programme.desc: U-boats posed the deadliest threat to Allied convoys traveling the Atlantic.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Dunkirk (September 1, 1939)
programme.desc: To keep France free, 400,000 English soldiers have manned the battlefields. Germany's strength is too great and pushes the British to the coast town of Dunkirk.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Fall of Poland
programme.desc: German tanks roll into Poland in September 1939.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Andria & David
programme.desc: David is the only love Andria has ever known. Love letters and voice messages make Andria stay. But having never met after 10 years, she needs to know what he is hiding that keeps him away. (S4, ep15)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Craig & Zoe
programme.desc: Craig's sister introduced him to a beautiful girl named Zoe on Facebook. After talks online of a future life together, things turn sour. Now he wants to know who he gave his heart to.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Antwane & Tony
programme.desc: Nev and Max are contacted by Carmen who is sounding the alarm on behalf of her cousin, Antwane. He's been in a three-year romance with a man named Tony that he met on a telephone chat line.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Tracie & Sammie
programme.desc: Tracie Thoms had a connection with a fan named 'Sammie' after hearing about the passing of Sammie's friend. Sammie suddenly disappeared and now Tracie is left wondering who Sammie really is?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Anthony & Marq
programme.desc: Anthony is a war veteran who wears his heart on his sleeve. Over a year ago, he bonded online with a caring man named Marq. Today, they're head over heels in love - but what is Marq hiding?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Artis & Jess
programme.desc: Five months ago Artis met Jess online. Artis and Jess each were in relationships, but believed they'd found true love. But is Jess everything that she says she is? (S2, ep9)

programme.title: The Hills: I Heidi Take Thee Spencer / Don't Cry On Your Birthday
programme.desc: When Lauren and Heidi have a run-in, they put their feud aside and remember why they used to be friends. Justin shocks Audrina by whisking her away to Palm Springs! Last in the series. (S4, ep20)

programme.title: The City: The Truth Will Reveal Itself
programme.desc: Whitney's world is turned upside-down when a boy from her past shows up to warn her that Jay has been fooling around. Olivia decides that befriending Whitney is her new project. (S1, ep2)

programme.title: The City: The L Word
programme.desc: Whitney gets mixed signals from Jay and decides to ask him directly where she stands. Erin's new boyfriend comes to visit and Whitney realizes it's time to find her own apartment. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: The City: Good Things Come In Threes
programme.desc: Whitney dates a new guy and Jay confesses to Adam his true feelings about Whitney. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: The City: Boys Night Out
programme.desc: Adam lets loose while his girlfriend Allie is out of town, but when she hears he kissed another girl from Whitney and the others, Adam finds himself in hot water. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: The City: He Never Said He Had a Girlfriend
programme.desc: Allie breaks down after a run in with the girl who claims she kissed Adam, but Adam sticks to his story to win Allie back, and Whitney gets upset with Jay for taking Adam's side. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: The City: The Truth Hurts
programme.desc: Kelly Cutrone accuses Allie of being too skinny, and Whitney finds herself caught in the middle. Erin runs into an ex-boyfriend and old feelings begin to return. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: The City: Mingling with the Commoners
programme.desc: Olivia invites Jay's band to perform at one of her charity events but her plan backfires when the band is disrespected on-stage, leaving Whitney and Olivia at odds. (s1, ep8)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Where's the Beach
programme.desc: Sammi decides to make peace with Snooki and Deena. JWOWW runs into her old flame Roger and sparks fly. Meanwhile, Snooki gets arrested for public intoxication. Series 3, Episode 3.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: In 1986, 21-year-old Mitzi Nalley was brutally murdered in her Austin, Texas home. Police arrested Jonathan Wayne Nobles, who confessed to the crime and was sentenced to the death penalty.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Walking Free
programme.desc: The story of David Camm, who was convicted in two murder trials -- each eventually overturned -- and was found not guilty in his third trial for the murder of his wife and two children.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Live to Tell: One Last Hug
programme.desc: An updated report on growing dangers of dating and breakup violence, focusing on Melissa Dohme, who agreed to meet a former boyfriend, Robert Burton, for one last hug before they broke up forever. The decision nearly cost her her life.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Body of Lies
programme.desc: In 2006, 31-year-old Leisha Hurst, while attending Barstow College, began dating fellow student, 34-year-old Jeami Chiapulis. Chiapulis seemed to be the man she could settle down with. The couple had plans to marry when Hurst vanished on January 22, 2009

programme.title: 48 Hours: Live to Tell: Full Moon
programme.desc: In August 1996, Yvette Rodier and Zach Snarr went to the mountains for their date to take photos of the full moon, when a stranger drove up, pulled out a gun and opened fire. Zach was killed. Yvette, shot four times, survived by pretending to be dead.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Millionaire Manhunt
programme.desc: After a review of the circumstances surrounding the 1987 murder of Lita McClinton Sullivan and the police investigation of her husband, Jim Sullivan, the program follows Sullivan’s extradition from Thailand in 2004 and his ensuing trial for Lita’s murder.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Controllers (Part 2)
programme.desc: Jim Phelps lets himself be framed for murder in a scheme to discredit a scientist who has developed a mind-destroying drug in the second of a two-part episode on Paramount Television's "Mission: Impossible."

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: Musical comedy star Sally Ann Howes plays a dramatic role as a guest member of the IMF when it sets out to foil a plot to ruin a friendly country with counterfeit money on Paramount Television's "Mission: Impossible."

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Commandante
programme.desc: To free an imprisoned priest whose life is at stake, Jim Phelps poses as a missionary, Paris becomes a Chinese general and Barney builds a helicopter on Paramount Television's "Mission: Impossible."

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Double Circle
programme.desc: Guest star Anne Francis joins the IMF when it sets out to prevent destruction of a secret formula vital to America's missile defense system on Paramount Television's "Mission: Impossible."

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Submarine
programme.desc: To locate a hoard of stolen money, the IMF takes the one man who knows its hiding place (guest star Stephen McNally) on a bizarre submarine voyage on Paramount Television's "Mission: Impossible."

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop can't find anybody to play with her. When the others see her feeling sad, they decide to play whatever she wants to play. The dinos and kids are planning a camp-out at the park.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: China - Welcome, Cousin Riff
programme.desc: BJ is waiting for a very special letter from his pen pal in China. The letter reveals that his pen pal is coming for a visit. With the help of friends in the park, BJ hurries to get the park ready.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: The Park Kids decide to have a Dog Show to show off their pets. A rainy day has everyone stuck in the Caboose. Barney suggests fun activities.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Play for Exercise!
programme.desc: The children are surprised to learn that playing games and having fun in the park is great exercise. Baby Bop is happy to learn that not only is she exercising while she plays, but exercise will make her grow big and strong.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A Fountain of Fun
programme.desc: While Barney and the children wait for Mr. Boyd's new fountain to be delivered, they have fun playing in and exploring the park.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Gift Of The Dinos - Winter
programme.desc: It's Christmas and BJ dreams of getting a new baseball glove to go with his baseball, while Riff hopes for new drumsticks to use his drum. Barney reminds them that Christmas is more than just getting gifts and helps them learn the meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Bop Til You Drop - Sharing
programme.desc: The park is especially full of kids today, but all of them are busy playing. Baby Bop can't find anyone to play what she wants to play. When the others notice she is sad, they tell her they will play whatever she suggests.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Look What I Can Do
programme.desc: Barney's friends are playing a fun game of "I Can Do" where they each share something they can do. When BJ suggests having an "I Can Do" show, Baby Bop becomes worried.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Battle Bought
programme.desc: Mint 1800s French "Harmonica Pistol" and a collection of '90s remote controlled combat robots.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Flying Ton, Creeping Allen
programme.desc: When a group of thugs try to bully Ton and Allen out of a Chinatown auction, the guys fight back, leading to a violent showdown and the discovery of both a rare Bornean blowgun and special effects wire harnesses.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Big Crush
programme.desc: The guys battle it out with their fierce former-employee, while a shill bidder threatens to ruin the day. When all hope seems lost, a set of monster truck tires and a mystery box are their last chance to come out on top.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Dead Aim
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face-off against an auction buyer with shady bidding tactics and even more questionable fashion sense. The guys find a custom-built monowheel & a rifle designed to ward off grave robbers in the early 19th century!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Risk & Reward
programme.desc: Ton & Allen arrive late to an auction. They uncover vintage bear traps and a bounty of street art. If the pieces belong to the artist, RISK, it could be their biggest score ever. If not, they'll be stuck with forged knockoffs.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Brew-Phoria
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go all in for an electric car, but with the batteries missing, a pricey refurb is their only shot at a profit. Will a home brewing system and high-end air rifles help soften the blow, or will they take a big loss?

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Diesel Digs
programme.desc: The guys head to the industrial hub of LA to score some heavy machinery and unearth a 1981 Bobcat 743 Frontloader, one of the first powered by a diesel engine and a trench-defending WWI German Sturmtrupp helmet bashing mace.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sidecar Surprise
programme.desc: An unassuming mom in an oversized sweater tries to pull the wool over Ton & Allen's eyes at a storage auction in Arlington, VA. The guys uncover a black powder cannon designed in the 15th century & a Russian military motorcycle!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chi-Town Showdown
programme.desc: Metal Victorian-era burial casket; 1870s glass fire extinguisher grenades; a mechanical 1896 handcrafted Chicago fire station alarm box.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Pucks for Bucks
programme.desc: The guys get stuck with a unit they didn't want and have to sort through trash to make their bottom line. They uncover glass blowing tools, autographed baseballs and a hockey puck launcher, which puts Ton in the line of fire.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Trading Places
programme.desc: When an injury sidelines Allen, he stays at the shop while Ton takes Big Sis to the auction and goes rogue, ignoring Allen's advice and making risky purchases that could lose the partners a boatload of cash.

programme.title: The Loss Adjuster
programme.desc: Hapless Insurance Loss Adjuster - Martin Dyer - feels his life is spiralling out of control but discovers that even when you reach rock bottom, that some clouds really do have a silver lining.

programme.title: You Can’t Fight Christmas
programme.desc: Interior designer Leslie Major loves all things Christmas. When she meets handsome Edmund James, she quickly learns he thinks the festivities are frivolous and superficial.

programme.title: A Very Corgi Christmas
programme.desc: Laura, a single mom meets a fellow single dad Ben, who enlists her help in taking care of a cute corgi puppy he plans to give to his daughter at Christmas. Through all the chaos, Lauren gets the chance to finally experience the holiday spirit.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Second Chances
programme.desc: Leah meets a cute boy, while Chelsea and Adam officially call it quits. Jenelle faces jail time, and Kailyn and Jordan start having issues. (S3, ep5)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Building Blocks
programme.desc: Corey has second thoughts about the divorce; Chelsea visits a beauty school; Jenelle decides to move in with Josh; Kailyn plans a visit to her family in Texas. (S3, ep7)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Caught In The Middle
programme.desc: Leah tells Jeremy about her confusion with Corey, Chelsea tries to get back on track with school. Things fall apart with Jenelle because she moved in quickly with Josh. (S3, ep8)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: A New Direction
programme.desc: Leah finds a larger house for her and Jeremy; Chelsea's dog goes missing; Jenelle and Josh part ways; Kailyn learns that Suzi visited Isaac behind her back. (S3, ep9)

programme.title: Teen Mom 2: Half Empty Half Full
programme.desc: Leah plans a 2nd birthday party for the girls, Chelsea convinces her dad to help her move, Kieffer comes crashing back into Jenelle's life, and Kailyn meets a cute new boy named Javi. (S3, ep10)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Amber worries she's developed a new addiction to food and consults a doctor about her weight. Farrah decides to open a frozen yogurt shop, while Tyler's concerned that Catelynn is falling back into her old, bad habits.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: When a firefighter dies, Mac discovers similarities to a string of arson cases.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A man opens fire during a political rally, injuring a senatorial candidate.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The team investigate the body of a woman dressed in a ballgown found in a lake.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Bodies discovered relate to a psychopath re-enacting the game of Clue in real life.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Nine Thirteen
programme.desc: The CSIs investigate when a masked man is found at the bottom of a notorious skyscraper known for its history of mysterious deaths.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Bad Seed
programme.desc: Delko returns to the team following an extended absence through injury.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A wedding takes a wrong turn when the bride is missing her groom.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSIs investigate a fatal car accident.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Kill Clause
programme.desc: The CSIs suspect a company is killing its employees in order to profit.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A body falls from the sky and the team discover it is from a commercial space flight.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Smoke Gets In Your CSIs
programme.desc: Calleigh is in a coma after a smoke inhalation injury sustained while investigating a case involving a dead doctor, drug dealers, and black market organ transplants.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: I Will Hunt You Down
programme.desc: When two escaped inmates surface in Colorado Springs, it’s up to Lt. Joe Kenda and his Fugitive Unit to bring them to justice.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: A Killer Always Rings Twice
programme.desc: When 22 year-old Micki Filmore is found raped and murder in her apartment, detective Kenda focuses his investigation on her activities the previous night.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Dead On Target
programme.desc: A young father-to-be is shot dead in broad daylight by a single bullet fired from afar. At the crime scene, Kenda recognizes the hallmark of a skilled sniper.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: The Girl Next Door
programme.desc: When a young army vet is found stabbed to death on his living room floor, suspicions quickly fall to a neighbor who was arrested during a nearby altercation.

programme.title: Very Scary People: Charles Manson: The Devil’s Work (Part 1)
programme.desc: The Charles Manson story is told via Manson Family members, victims’ families, witnesses, prosecutors, reporters, authors, and Manson in his own words detailing the horror of the vicious attacks.

programme.title: The Exes
programme.desc: When Phil and Holly make a pact to ask their bosses for raises, Phil gets fired. Holly tries to help Phil get his job back. Stuart's integrity is tested when he dates a British woman with repulsive teeth.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Hyphenated Name Episode
programme.desc: A newlywed couple (Terry Crews, Essence Atkins) with two children face various blended-family obstacles in this sitcom based on the 2005 film of the same name.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Credit Check Episode

programme.desc: The case of Ryan Ferguson, who was released from prison in 2013, after nearly 10 years behind bars for murder. 48 HOURS team have been investigating the murder and the bizarre circumstances that put Ryan Ferguson in prison for the crime since 2006

programme.title: 48 Hours: Getting Away with Murder?
programme.desc: A report on families who have experienced the violent death of a loved one and believe they know the identity of the killer but lack evidence to back the charge.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Why Did Josh Kill?
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Maddie Clifton of Jacksonville, Florida went outside to play and never came back. Seven days later a city-wide search led to the home of Josh Phillips, a 14-year-old neighbor, where Maddie's body was found under the boy's waterbed.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Family Torn Apart
programme.desc: The murdered body of Bob Dorotik, a engineer and father of three, was found by a mountain road near his home in the foothills of San Diego, Ca. Despite her denial of any involvement, Jane, Dorotik’s wife of 30 years, was arrested for the crime.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: The investigation into the death of a woman's husband reveals he is not the first man she married who died under suspicious circumstances.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Time to Kill
programme.desc: 17-year-old Sterling Barber was accused of murdering Gerald Douglas Wyatt, a church deacon. The Carnesville, Georgia teenager claimed that he acted in self-defense because Wyatt, known to be a predator, was trying to molest him.

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Perhaps horrors greatest star, Karloff, of course, played the Frankenstein monster. Heres an affectionate look at this cultured Englishman.

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Dracula wasnt the only blood-sucker immortalized on film. Here is some of his competition.

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Nothing like a good ghost story  except a centurys worth of films filled with more ghost stories!

programme.title: Love at First Bite
programme.desc: After being evicted from his castle in Transylvania, Count Dracula and his assistant Renfield travel to New York to find a woman who the Count believes is the reincarnation of the woman he has loved for all eternity.

programme.title: Aenigma
programme.desc: The spirit of a comatose teenage girl possesses the body of a newcomer to her girls boarding school to enact bloody revenge against the elitist, lingerie-clad coeds responsible for her condition.

programme.title: Pluto TV 80’s Horror
programme.desc: Slashers, synths, and supernatural scares—Pluto TV 80’s Horror brings you the blood-soaked glory days of fright. From cult classics to VHS gems, relive the decade that made horror iconic. Big hair, bigger screams!

programme.title: Re-Animator: Re-Animator
programme.desc: Brilliant and deranged medical student Herbert has his own outlandish theories and has concocted a serum that will bring the dead back to life. Roping in a fellow student their shocking experiments work all too well with horrific and very messy results.

programme.title: The Farm
programme.desc: FrightFest Presents. A brutal, gore-tastic slasher/survival horror, in the vein of The Texas Chainsaw Massacre and Wolf Creek. While on a road trip a couple decide to stop at a diner.

programme.title: The Pumpkin Karver
programme.desc: After mistaking him for a masked killer, Jonathan fatally stabs his sister’s boyfriend. A year later, the siblings find themselves fighting against a familiar masked murderer.

programme.title: Watch Me When I Kill
programme.desc: When Mara stops into a pharmacy, she cannot realise that the person at the counter is a murderer and the pharmacist is already dead. Mara is then stalked by the killer, who is determined to eliminate the only witness to his crime

programme.title: The Plague Dogs
programme.desc: A stunning animated adaptation of Richard Adams' novel, The Plague Dogs follows a pair of dogs, Snitter and Rowf, who escape from a research laboratory and try to survive in the wild with the help of a cunning fox.

programme.title: Creature from the Haunted Sea
programme.desc: In this spoof of horror and spy thrillers, American gangster Renzo Capetto decides to kill members of his bungling crew and blame their deaths on a legendary sea creature. What he doesn't know is that the creature is actually out there!

programme.title: The Little Shop of Horrors
programme.desc: A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's carnivorous, forcing him to kill to feed it.

programme.title: Let Me In
programme.desc: A bullied young boy befriends a young female vampire who lives in secrecy with her guardian. Starring: Kodi Smit-McPhee, Chloë Grace Moretz, Richard Jenkins

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E16 - The Locket
programme.desc: A temporal distortion traps Aeryn and John on a planet's surface, where they live out the rest of their lives.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E17 - The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: Crais and Talyn return. The crew are put on trial for an attack that Talyn made on an alien ship.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E18 - A Clockwork Nebari
programme.desc: A Nebari group comes aboard Moya and attempts to mind cleanse everyone using a drug. Pilot and Rygel are the only two who can resist the effects.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E19 - Liars, Guns And Money, Part 1: A Not So Simple Plan
programme.desc: D'Argo finally gets a lead on his son, Jothee. He will do anything to get him back, but Jothee will be sold as a slave.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E20 - Liars, Guns And Money, Part 2: With Friends Like These
programme.desc: With the loot from the Depository heist at hand, D'Argo anxiously waits to make contact with the Slave Traders.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E21 - Liars, Guns And Money, Part 3: Plan B
programme.desc: The crew is going to break into the depository to free Crichton. Crichton is being tortured for wormhole technology.
